|rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-RE7000 Q87-RE7000] (2016-04-14) AC1733/N300 *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/Q87-RE6800 Q87-RE6800] (2016-12-15) AC1733/N300 "0500-2540800400" and "1602" (01/2016) is silkscreened on the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2958647 board]. {{see also|Linksys|U-MEDIA}} ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_re7000 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7621 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==See also== [http://www.linksys.com/us/range-extenders/c/wireless-wi-fi-range-extenders/ Wireless Range Extenders]
[[List of Linksys Wireless Devices#Repeaters/Range Extenders|Repeaters/Range Extenders]] *[[Linksys RE6300]] - AC750 BOOST Wi-Fi Range Extender :• FCC ID: Q87-RE6300 (2015-09-17) [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE6300/ PPage] *[[Linksys RE6400]] - AC1200 BOOST EX Wi-Fi Range Extender :• FCC ID: Q87-RE6400 (2015-09-21) [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE6400/ PPage] *[[Linksys RE6500]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender :• FCC ID: Q87-RE6500 (2014-04-24) AC1200 MAX WiFi [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE6500/ PPage] *[[Linksys RE6500HG]] - AC1200 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender :''High-Gain antennas AMPLIFY Wi-Fi signal'' [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE6500HG/ PPage] *[[Linksys RE6700]] - AC1200 AMPLIFY Dual-Band Wi-Fi Range Extender :• FCC ID: Q87-RE6700 (2015-04-17) Wireless Extender *[[Linksys RE6800]] - AC1900 Dual-Band Wireless Range Extender :• FCC ID: Q87-RE6800 (2016-12-15) ex-RE7000 *Linksys RE7000 - Max-Stream AC1900+ MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Range Extender :• FCC ID: Q87-RE7000 (2016-04-14) AC1733/N300 [http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-RE7000/ PPage] [[Category:English Documentation]]
